purpose: The email announces the opening of applications for the 2025 Summer School on Informatics Education Research (SCHIER), which is the only summer school in Europe focused on this field. It provides details about the event, including the dates, location, target audience, and registration fees. The email encourages PhD students, postdocs, and researchers interested in Informatics Education Research to apply, highlighting the benefits of expert-led lectures, collaborative discussions, and networking opportunities. The application deadline is set for June 25, 2025, and there is a limited number of spots available.

evidence_sentences: Applications are now open for the 2025 Summer School on Informatics Education Research (SCHIER).
SCHIER: the only summer school in Europe exclusively focused on research in Informatics Education.
[Who should attend] PhD students, postdocs, and researchers with an interest in Informatics Education Research
Applications are now open, limited to 40 participants on a first-come, first-served basis.
Don’t miss this unique opportunity to engage with a vibrant community of researchers shaping the future of Informatics Education in Europe!
